flawed_nl_solution:
Cassy can pack 12 x 10 = <<12*10=120>>120 jars of jam in the 10 boxes.
She can also pack 10 x 30 = <<10*30=30>>30 jars of jam in the 30 boxes.
A total of 30 + 120 = <<30+120=150>>150 jars of jam can be packed in the boxes.
So, 500 - 150 = <<500-150=350>>350 jars of jam will be left unpacked.
#### 350

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 30. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
